TONY5.original: ~s~While on foot, sticky bombs can be thrown by holding ~INPUT_AIM~ to aim and ~INPUT_ATTACK~ to throw.
TONY5.translated: ~s~步行时，按住~INPUT_AIM~瞄准，按~INPUT_ATTACK~投掷黏弹。

TONY5.original: ~s~The next target is on an out of service subway train, intercept it at the ~y~tunnel exit.
TONY5.translated: ~s~下一个目标是一列非运营的地铁，去~y~隧道出口~s~拦截。

TONY5.original: ~r~You lost the train.
TONY5.translated: ~r~你跟丢了列车。

TONY5.original: ~s~Press ~INPUT_DETONATE~ to detonate the sticky bombs.
TONY5.translated: ~s~按~INPUT_DETONATE~引爆黏弹。

TONY5.original: ~s~You are out of sticky bombs, call Armando to buy some more.
TONY5.translated: ~s~你的黏弹用完了，打电话向Armando购买。

TONY5.original: ~s~Now detonate the bombs to destroy the crane.
TONY5.translated: ~s~引爆黏弹，炸毁塔吊。

TONY5.original: ~s~The first target is a ~r~construction foreman. ~s~He operates the nearby crane.
TONY5.translated: ~s~第一个目标是一名~r~包工头。~s~他是工地的塔吊司机。

TONY5.original: ~s~Press ~PAD_DPAD_DOWN~ to detonate the sticky bombs.
TONY5.translated: ~s~按~PAD_DPAD_DOWN~引爆黏弹。

TONY5.original: ~s~Destroy the ~r~train~s~ using sticky bombs.
TONY5.translated: ~s~用黏弹摧毁~r~列车。

TONY5.original: ~s~Security has spotted you and the plane is preparing to take off.
TONY5.translated: ~s~安保人员发现了你，飞机即将起飞。

TONY5.original: ~s~They will stick to any object they touch and can be detonated using ~PAD_DPAD_DOWN~ or by being shot.
TONY5.translated: ~s~黏弹会吸附在物体表面，可以通过射击或是按下~PAD_DPAD_DOWN~引爆。

TONY5.original: ~s~Throw several sticky bombs onto the base of the ~r~crane.
TONY5.translated: ~s~在~r~塔吊底座~s~上安放几枚黏弹。

TONY5.original: ~s~Approach the runway through the ~y~security gate.
TONY5.translated: ~s~从~y~安全门~s~进入跑道。

TONY5.original: ~s~The crane was not destroyed, new explosives need to be set on the ~r~crane base.
TONY5.translated: ~s~塔吊未被摧毁，需要在~r~塔吊底座~s~上安放新的黏弹。

TONY5.original: ~s~They will stick to any object they touch and can be detonated using ~INPUT_DETONATE~ or by being shot.
TONY5.translated: ~s~黏弹会吸附在物体表面，可以通过射击或是按下~INPUT_DETONATE~引爆。

TONY5.original: ~r~The target's plane has taken off.
TONY5.translated: ~r~目标的飞机起飞了。

TONY5.original: ~s~Get to the ~y~airport.~s~ The next target's plane is taking off at ~1~:~1~.
TONY5.translated: ~s~前往~y~机场。~s~下一个目标的飞机将在~1~:~1~起飞。

TONY5.original: ~s~You must destroy the ~r~plane ~s~before it takes off.
TONY5.translated: ~s~你必须在目标起飞前摧毁~r~飞机。

TONY5.original: ~s~Lose the cops.
TONY5.translated: ~s~甩掉警察。

TONY5.original: ~r~You took too long to destroy the train.
TONY5.translated: ~r~你花了太多时间在摧毁列车上。

TONY5.original: ~s~The crane is rigged to blow, get clear.
TONY5.translated: ~s~爆破准备完毕，远离塔吊。

TONY5.original: ~s~The ~r~train ~s~has stopped at the station in Fortside.
TONY5.translated: ~r~目标列车~s~正停靠在Fortside车站。

TONY5.original: ~s~When in a vehicle press ~INPUT_VEH_ATTACK~ to throw a sticky bomb left.
TONY5.translated: ~s~在载具中时，按~INPUT_VEH_ATTACK~向左侧投掷黏弹。

TONY5.original: ~s~You are too far away, go back and destroy the ~r~crane.
TONY5.translated: ~s~你离得太远了，回去炸毁~r~塔吊。

TONY5.original: ~s~Holding ~INPUT_VEH_CIN_CAM~ will focus the camera on the target.
TONY5.translated: ~s~按住~INPUT_VEH_CIN_CAM~可将镜头对准目标。
